summary: Shows time-series data of stealth authentications
description: Retrieves time-series data for successful stealth authentication actions (passphrase creations) and detrimental passphrase probings.

parameters.name: window
parameters.description: Specifies size of the window in seconds to perform time-series analysis.

parameters.name: frames
parameters.description: Specifies number of windows to perform time-series analysis.

mean.description: Expected value of the time-series source.

items.description: The array will contain sample data in pre-determined order: Index, number of successful authentications, number of failed authentications and timestamp of the sample.

200.description: Response containing time-series data for stealth authentication analytics.
